948140.name: Eximius - Supporter Pack
948140.description:
Attention Officers,

We are proud to present the Eximius: Seize the Frontline Supporter Pack.
To the people who wants to support us further and be the envy of others, look no further and Arm yourself with this bundle of goodness.

All items in this bundle are purely cosmetics and does not affect gameplay in any way.
You can find the following digital items:

- A mini Soundtrack album composed by Nir Shor

- 3 Unique Callsign Packs containing the following:
- 15 New Officer Callsigns and Icon
- 9 Unique Team Banners to be displayed at various locations in game by Team Commanders

Thank you for your Support!
- Ammobox Studios Dev Team

123
948140.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
